document.full_text: an arizona judge on friday sentenced an iraqi immigrant to 34-1/2 years in jail for murder and assault charges including killing his daughter by running her down with a jeep because she had become too westernized.
document.title: iraqi jailed in arizona for 34 years in daughter's killing
lines_and_colors: an arizona judge on friday sentenced an iraqi immigrant to 34-1/2 years in jail for murder and assault charges including killing his daughter by running her down with a jeep because she had become too westernized.
